chantey.title: Haul Away Joe
chantey.text: Way, haul away; O, haul away my Rosey. Way, haul away; O, haul away _Joe._
chantey.abc: X: 809 T: Haul Away Joe C: Trad. M: 4/4 L: 1/8 K: Eb B2 B3/2 A/ F3 D|E E E E FG AF|B2 B3/2 A/ F3 D|E E F2 B,4|] w: Way, haul a-way; O, haul a-way my ro--sey._ Way, haul a-way; O, haul a-way Joe.
